description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: Rejected reason: Further research determined the issue is not a vulnerability. The Creditcoin blockchain team takes the stance that there is no real bug or vulnerability here and that the creditcoin-cli command is working as it was designed to.
